TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObjectReference

summary.span: 指示目前的介面實作器是對其他物件的參考。

span.span: Indicates that the current interface implementer is a reference to another object.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

span.para: 實作這個介面是不同的物件，直到完全還原目前的物件無法解析的參考的物件。修復階段的任何物件實作針對其實際查詢物件和該物件會插入至圖形。修復參考最終化尚未完成物件還原序列化程序期間參考的程序。

Implement this interface on objects that are references to a different object, which cannot be resolved until the current object is completely restored. During the fixup stage, any object implementing is queried for its real object and that object is inserted into the graph. Fixup refers to the process of finalizing references not already completed during the object deserialization process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRealObject(valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Function GetRealObject (context As StreamingContext) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 還原序列化目前物件的來源 。

span.span: The from which the current object is deserialized.

summary.span: 傳回應該還原序列化的實際物件，而不是序列化資料流指定的物件。

span.span: Returns the real object that should be deserialized, rather than the object that the serialized stream specifies.

returns.span: 傳回置放入圖形的真實物件。

span.span: Returns the actual object that is put into the graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是您用來序列化 proxy 建立者物件，而不是實際物件的遠端狀況中很有用。This method is useful in a remoting situation where you serialize a proxy-creator object, not an actual object. 當 proxy 建立者物件經過還原序列化時、 還原序列化呼叫其方法。When the proxy-creator object is deserialized, deserialization calls its method. 此時，proxy 建立者物件建立 proxy 物件，它是指原始的實際物件，可能是在遠端電腦上的新執行個體。At this point, the proxy-creator object creates a new instance of the proxy object that refers back to the original actual object, perhaps on a remote computer. 最後，proxy 建立者物件會被捨棄，並稍後記憶體回收所回收。Finally, the proxy-creator object is discarded and reclaimed later by garbage collection. 例如，請考慮如何物件都會序列化。For example, consider how objects are serialized. 而不是資料傳輸，從物件時，系統會將傳輸持有者具有名稱的物件型別物件，它位於物件實作的組件的詳細資訊的。Instead of transmitting the data from the object, the system transmits a holder object with the name of the type object and information on the assembly where it is found in an object implementing . 可用的型別名稱和組件名稱時，還原序列化基礎結構會呼叫已傳輸持有者物件上。When both the type name and assembly name are available, the deserialization infrastructure calls on the holder object that has been transmitted. 傳回這個持有者插入至圖形的物件。This holder returns the object that is inserted into the graph. 這個方法受到如與指定。This method is protected by a for the with the specified. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 呼叫無法在中度信任的伺服器上運作。

span.span: The call will not work on a medium trusted server.
